long_description: Built with good Shimano components for easy shifting, a reinforced frame for quick handling and fast-rolling 29 in. wheels, the women's Cannondale Tango SL 29er 3 offers agile singletrack performance. Women-specific design is optimized for a great fit on large 29er bikes with a frame design that offers a low stand-over height. 6061 aluminum frame features sturdy, butted tubes and shaped chainstays and seatstays to improve efficiency and comfort. SL version features a reinforced triangle in the front of the frame and an oversize 1.5 in. headtube and fork steerer to enhance strength, rigidity and steering precision. RockShox 30 Gold suspension fork delivers 80mm of travel with lockout to help smooth the trails; size-specific springs deliver optimized performance. Shimano Alivio trigger shifters control the Alivio front derailleur and Shimano Deore rear derailleur for precise, easy shifts through the 27 gears. Shimano hydraulic disc brakes use a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in the back to supply dependable speed management in all conditions. Maddux DC3.0 rims are outfitted with versatile, fast-rolling Schwalbe Rapid Rob tires to provide confident handling and traction. Specs on the Cannondale Tango SL 3 29er women's hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
short_description: Built with good Shimano components for easy shifting, a reinforced frame for quick handling and fast-rolling 29 in. wheels, the women's Cannondale Tango SL 29er 3 offers agile singletrack performance.
